thread.title: Win a signed England rugby shirt
thread.title_full: Win a signed England rugby shirt - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win a signed England rugby shirt
text: Brian Moore wore an England shirt 64 times in his illustrious career and few players showed more pride in doing so. Over the next five weeks, Brian will be choosing a Liontrust Hero of the Round after each group of matches – three rounds of pool games plus each knockout stage. This will be the player who has shown a Moore-like devotion to the shirt and gone above and beyond the call of duty in the name of his country. Thanks to Brian – and Liontrust – two lucky Telegraph readers can win a retro-style England shirt signed by him. The shirt will be framed, too. For your chance to win, enter your details in the form below. Ask the experts Liontrust is a specialist fund management group that takes pride in its distinct culture. It focuses on asset classes in which it has particular expertise and its fund managers are independent thinkers who have the courage of their convictions in investment decisions. For more details, visit liontrust.co.uk » Read more about the Liontrust Sporting Hero of the Month » Online Form - Win a signed England rugby shirt
